== Theme Idea ==

Using smooth gradients ala the Smooth Engine to create a consistent look between the toolbar, menubar, and metacity title bar.  Other parts of this theme use ubuntulooks and clearlooks.

=== Concept ===
Latest version w/brown and brown/orange
